title: CAIM Initialization Failure Report V1.0
description: Defines the mandatory structure for reports generated by CAIM upon failure (SIH or RRP triggers).

report_id.description: Unique identifier for this specific initialization attempt/report.

status.description: Indicates if SIH or RRP was triggered.

phase_index.description: Phase where failure occurred (0: Integrity Verification, 1: Structural Compliance).

protocol_triggered.description: The protocol responsible for system termination (SIH or RRP).

asset_affected_id.description: GACR identifier of the resource causing the failure. May be 'N/A' for Phase 0 critical infrastructure failure.

error_code.description: Standardized internal error code (e.g., CRoT_MISMATCH, SDVM_SCHEMA_VIOLATION).

details.description: Specific, actionable diagnostic details for remediation.
